Self.Wiki: Determines the parameters for interactive smoke.

emitNum.Wiki: The touchable smoke SFX count to generate.

lifeTime.Wiki: The duration of the touchable smoke. In seconds.

radius.Wiki: The radius of the touchable smoke. In metres.

addSfxTime.Wiki: The time for the touchable smoke to interact with other entities (e.g. create more smoke). In seconds.

offsetRandomRange.AltName: Maximum Distance from Impact for Generation
offsetRandomRange.Wiki: The maximum distance from the point of impact to generate SFX.

sfxId.Wiki: The SFX ID to use for the smoke that appears at the impact point.

addMainSfxId.Wiki: The SFX ID to use for the smoke that sticks when touching the main smoke SFX.

addSubSfxId.Wiki: The SFX ID to use for the smoke that sticks when touching the main smoke SFX (randomly generated from parts)
